messages.subject: about limiting food w/alergies are involved
messages.msgSnippet: My kids are all alergic to milk and other food items but all to differing degrees (from eczema to asmah(sp?) to skin rashes to upset stomach and more)  I
messages.messageBody:
My kids are all alergic to milk and other food items but all to
differing degrees (from eczema to asmah(sp?) to skin rashes to upset
stomach and more) I always tell them the result of eating such a
thing and (as long as they are not going to have asmah and wind up in
the ER) I let them have it. Alot of the time they say but it tastes
so good and eat it. I never understood this I would think it wasn't
worth it to them but alot of time they go for it (with other options
available). I always said with alergies it will help them over come
the reaction (trying to slowly introdouce it into their diet) but I am
usually met with rolled eyes and people trying to convince my child
not to eat it. Thanks for finally someone who gets what I am trying
to teach (them to make their own decisions).

great board every time I read it
jean
